summary.span: 提供辅助功能应用程序用于为残障用户调整应用程序的用户界面 (UI) 的信息。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's user interface (UI) for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辅助功能应用程序可以调整应用程序的功能，以提高残障用户的可用性。Accessibility applications can adjust features of the application to improve usability for users with disabilities. 对于视觉障碍的用户，你可以调整软件和操作系统功能以符合其需求。For users who are visually impaired, you can adjust software and operating system features to comply with their needs. 例如，你可以放大文本和图像，并以对比度进行呈现。For example, you can enlarge text and images and render them with a contrast. 此外，您还可以通过适当的颜色使用来适应色盲。In addition, you can accommodate color-blindness with the appropriate use of colors. 对于严重受到影响的用户，可以通过屏幕查看辅助工具访问计算机，将屏幕上的文本转换为语音或动态、可刷新的盲文显示。For users who are severely visually impaired, computers are accessible with screen review aids that translate on-screen text to speech or to a dynamic, refreshable, Braille display. 对于有困难的用户，您可以设计使用视觉提示的程序，例如闪烁的工具栏;或者，您可以将口述消息显示为文本。For users who are hard of hearing, you can design programs that use visual cues, such as a flashing toolbar; or you can display spoken messages as text. 例如，当启用时，"控制面板" 中的 " `SoundSentry` 辅助功能" 选项会在系统发出警报声时提供视觉警告。For example, when turned on, the `SoundSentry` feature, an accessibility option in Control Panel, provides a visual warning whenever the system makes an alarm sound. 对于具有运动障碍的用户，您可以设计用于优化或消除键盘和鼠标使用的控件，从而提高计算机的可访问性。For users with motion disabilities, you can design controls that refine or eliminate keyboard and mouse use, thereby improving computer accessibility. 控制面板提供协助。Control Panel offers assistance. 例如，一种替代方法是使用数字键盘而不是鼠标来进行导航。For example, one alternative is to use the numeric keypad instead of the mouse for navigation. 名为的另一种方法 `StickyKeys` 使不能同时按住两个或多个键的用户 (如 CTRL + P) ，通过每次键入一个键即可获得相同的结果。Another option, called `StickyKeys`, enables users who cannot hold down two or more keys at a time (such as CTRL+P) to get the same result by typing one key at a time. 对于具有认知和语言障碍的用户，您可以设计软件程序，以便更好地满足其需求。For users with cognitive and language disabilities, you can design software programs to better accommodate their needs. 例如，使用有序或 cued 的序列化时，将会出现简单的显示、更少的单词，并以基本学校标准为目标的阅读级别可使这些用户受益。For example, using conspicuous or cued sequencing, uncomplicated displays, fewer words, and a reading level targeted to elementary school standards can benefit these users. 对于具有强制可能的用户，可以设计软件程序以消除捕获造成模式。For users with seizure disorders, you can design software programs to eliminate seizure provoking patterns. 有关辅助功能的详细信息，包括有关辅助功能应用程序的信息，请参阅 MSDN library 或 Microsoft 网站上的 Microsoft 辅助功能的文档。For more information about accessibility, including information about accessibility applications, see the documentation for Microsoft Accessibility in the MSDN library or at the Microsoft Web site. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用 ，你必须添加对 `Accessibility` 随安装的程序集的引用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 。To use the , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Windows 窗体仅支持 Active Accessibility 2.0。Windows Forms only supports Active Accessibility 2.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建可访问感知的图表控件， 并使用和 类公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的返回值类型 取决于具有键盘焦点的对象。The return value type of the property depends on the object that has keyboard focus. 下表介绍属性返回的对象类型 。The following table describes the object types that the property returns. |类型Type|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`null`|此对象本身不具有键盘焦点，并且不包含具有键盘焦点的子对象。This object does not have the keyboard focus itself and does not contain a child that has the keyboard focus.| |integerinteger|如果当前对象具有键盘焦点，则为 0;否则，具有键盘焦点的子辅助性对象的子 ID。0 if the current object has keyboard focus; otherwise, the child ID of the child accessible object with keyboard focus.| ||具有键盘焦点的子级辅助性对象。The child accessible object that has the keyboard focus.| 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面介绍 在调用 `Select` 以执行复杂选择操作时要指定哪些值。The following describes which values to specify when calling `Select` to perform complex selection operations. |OperationOperation|标志组合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |模拟单击To simulate a click| 或 OR | |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来选择目标项To select a target item by simulating CTRL+click| 或 OR | |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击取消选择目标项To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL+click| 或 OR | |模拟 SHIFT + 单击To simulate SHIFT+click| 或 OR | |选择对象范围并将焦点放在最后一个对象上To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|在起始对象上指定以设置选择定位点。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然后再次调用 Select，并 在最后一个对象上指定或。Then call Select again and specify OR on the last object.| |取消选择所有对象To deselect all objects|对任何对象指定。Specify on any object. 此标志取消选择除了刚选择的对象之外的所有选择的对象。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然后再次调用 Select，并 对同一对象指定。Then call Select again and specify on the same object.| 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取辅助性对象的位置和大小。

span.span: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.

value.span: 表示辅助性对象的边界的 。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在屏幕坐标中检索对象的边框。The property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates. 如果对象具有非矩形形状，则此属性表示完全包围整个对象区域的最小矩形。If the object has a nonrectangular shape, then this property represents the smallest rectangle that completely encompasses the entire object region. 因此，对于列表视图项之类的非矩形对象，对象的边框的坐标可能会失败（如果已通过调用方法进行测试）， 因为 在每个像素的基础上确定对象的边界。Therefore, for nonrectangular objects such as list view items, the coordinates of the object's bounding rectangle can fail, if tested, by calling the method, because determines the object's boundaries on a pixel-by-pixel basis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个可访问感知的图表控件，并使用 和 类公开辅助性信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码摘录演示了如何重写 属性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取描述对象默认操作的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.

summary.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

value.span: 对对象默认操作的描述；如果此对象没有默认操作，则为 。

span.span: A description of the default action for an object, or if this object has no default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字符串描述对对象执行的操作，而不是对象执行的操作。The string describes the action that is performed on an object, not what the object does as a result. 也就是说，打印文档的工具栏按钮的默认操作是 "按"，而不是 "打印当前文档"。That is, a toolbar button that prints a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document." 不要将对象的默认操作与它的值混淆。Do not confuse an object's default action with its value.

exception.span: 无法检索控件的默认操作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 如果对象包装具有默认操作的系统控件，则默认实现将返回可访问对象的默认操作;否则，它将返回 。

span.span: The default implementation returns the accessible object's default action if the object wraps a system control that has a default action; otherwise, it returns .

para.span: 只有执行操作的控件才应支持此方法。

span.span: Only controls that perform actions should support this method.

para.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作，并且某些对象可能具有与其属性相关的默认操作 ，如以下示例中所示：选中的复选框的默认操作为 "取消选中" 且值为 "已选中"。

span.span: Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."

para.span: 清除的复选框的默认操作为 "检查"，值为 "未选中"。

span.span: A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."

para.span: 标记为 "Print" 的按钮的默认操作是 "按"，没有任何值。

span.span: A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value.

para.span: 显示 "Printer" 的静态文本控件或编辑控件没有默认操作，但其值为 "Printer"。

span.span: A static text control or an edit control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."

para.span: 对象的 属性应为谓词或短动词短语。

span.span: An object's property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.

span.span: The default implementation returns the accessible object's description if the object wraps a system control; otherwise, it returns .

para.span: 描述通常用于为弱视用户或盲人用户提供更大的上下文。

span.span: The description is typically used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users.

para.span: 它还可以用于上下文搜索或其他应用程序。

span.span: It can also be used for context searching or other applications.

para.span: 如果说明不明显，或基于对象的 、 、 和 属性，则服务器需要支持属性。

span.span: Servers need to support the property if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties.

para.span: 例如，具有 "确定" 的按钮不需要其他信息，但显示仙人掌图片的按钮会。

span.span: For example, a button with "OK" does not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.

para.span: 仙人掌按钮的 "、 " 和 "可能" 属性说明了其用途，但 属性传达的信息不太明确，如 "按钮显示仙人掌类照片"。

span.span: The , , and perhaps properties for the cactus button describe its purpose, but the property conveys information that is less tangible, like "A button that shows a picture of a cactus".

summary.span: 执行与该辅助性对象相关的默认操作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端可以通过检查对象的属性来检索对象的默认操作 。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 如果支持) （而不是） 执行对象的默认操作，则客户端可以使用自动化 (。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 但是， 提供了一种简单的方法来执行对象的最常用操作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

exception.span: 无法执行该控件的默认操作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be performed.

para.span: 系统提供的用户界面元素所执行的默认操作取决于键盘状态。

span.span: The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state.

para.span: 也就是说，如果修改键（如 SHIFT、ALT 或 CTRL）关闭 (通过用户操作或在调用时以编程方式) ，则默认操作可能不同于这些键未关闭的情况。

span.span: That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down.

para.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键盘焦点的概念与活动窗口的概念相关。The concept of keyboard focus is related to that of an active window. 活动窗口是用户在其中工作的前台窗口。An active window is the foreground window in which the user is working. 具有键盘焦点的对象是活动窗口或活动窗口的子对象。The object with the keyboard focus is either the active window or a child object of the active window. 容器中只有一个对象或项可以在任何一次获得焦点。Only one object or item within a container can have the focus at any one time. 具有键盘焦点的对象不一定是所选对象。The object with the keyboard focus is not necessarily the selected object.

span.span: The control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 所有可以接收键盘焦点的对象都必须支持此属性。

span.span: All objects that can receive the keyboard focus must support this property.

summary.span: 获取辅助性对象的快捷键或访问键。

span.span: Gets the shortcut key or access key for the accessible object.

value.span: 辅助性对象的快捷键或访问键，或者，如果没有与此对象相关联的快捷键，则是 。

span.span: The shortcut key or access key for the accessible object, or if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问键（也称为助记键）是菜单、菜单项、按钮标签或其他控件的文本中带下划线的字符。An access key, also known as a mnemonic, is an underlined character in the text of a menu, menu item, label of a button, or some other control. 例如，用户可以按 ALT 键显示菜单，同时按指示的带下划线键（如 ALT + F）打开 `File` 菜单。For example, a user can display a menu by pressing the ALT key while also pressing the indicated underlined key, such as ALT+F, to open the `File` menu. 若要使用菜单项的访问键，包含该项的菜单必须处于活动状态。To use the access key of a menu item, the menu containing the item must be active. 控件（如工具栏按钮和菜单项）通常具有关联的快捷键。Controls such as toolbar buttons and menu items often have an associated shortcut key. 菜单项可以具有访问键和与其关联的快捷键。A menu item can have both an access key and a shortcut key associated with it. 如果该属性的值 是单个字符，则可以假定它是一个访问键。If the value of the property is a single character, you can assume it is an access key.

exception.span: 无法检索控件的快捷方式。

span.span: The shortcut for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 具有快捷键或访问键的所有对象都应支持此属性。

span.span: All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个字符串，客户端使用它来标识、查找或公布用户的对象。The property is a string used by clients to identify, find, or announce an object for the user. 若要访问子对象的名称，必须首先 使用要检索其名称的子级的索引调用。To access the name of a child object, you must first call with the index of the child whose name you are retrieving. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个可访问感知的图表控件，并使用 和 类公开辅助性信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码摘录演示了如何重写 属性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. para.span: 对象的名称应是直观的，以便用户了解对象的含义或用途。

span.span: An object's name should be intuitive so that users understand the object's meaning or purpose.

para.span: 此外，请确保 属性相对于父对象中的任何同级对象是唯一的。

span.span: Also, ensure that the property is unique relative to any sibling objects in the parent.

para.span: 在表中导航为某些用户带来了特别困难的问题。

span.span: Navigation within tables presents especially difficult problems for some users.

para.span: 因此，服务器开发人员应将表的单元名称设置为描述性名称。

span.span: Therefore, server developers should make table cell names as descriptive as possible.

para.span: 例如，您可以通过将它所占据的行和列的名称（如 "A1"）来创建单元名称。

span.span: For example, you might create a cell name by combining the names of the row and column it occupies, such as "A1."

para.span: 但是，使用更具描述性的名称（例如 "Karin，二月"）通常更好。

span.span: However, it is generally better to use more descriptive names, such as "Karin, February."

para.span: 许多对象（如图标、菜单、复选框、组合框和其他控件）都具有向用户显示的标签。

span.span: Many objects, such as icons, menus, check boxes, combo boxes, and other controls, have labels that are displayed to users.

para.span: 向用户显示的任何标签都应该用于对象的 属性。

span.span: Any label displayed to users should be used for the object's property.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 属性。

span.span: For more information, see the Property.

para.span: 如果使用的是属性的 "菜单" 或 "按钮文本" ，请去掉 & 标记键盘访问密钥的 "与" 符号 () 。

span.span: If you are using menu or button text for the property, strip out the ampersands (&) that mark the keyboard access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航（空间和逻辑）始终限制为容器中的用户界面元素。Navigation, both spatial and logical, is always restricted to the user interface elements within a container. 使用空间导航，客户端只能导航到起始对象的同级。With spatial navigation, clients can navigate only to a sibling of the starting object. 根据用于逻辑导航的导航标志，客户端可以导航到子对象的子对象或同级对象。Depending on the navigational flag used with logical navigation, clients can navigate to either a child or to a sibling of the starting object. 此方法不更改所选内容或焦点。This method does not change the selection or focus. 若要更改焦点或选择对象，请使用 。To change the focus or to select an object, use . 方法只检索具有定义的屏幕位置的用户界面元素。The method retrieves only user interface elements that have a defined screen location. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个可访问感知的图表控件，并使用 和 类公开辅助性信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码演示如何重写 方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 修改选择内容或移动辅助性对象的键盘焦点。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用此方法执行复杂的选择操作。Applications can use this method to perform complex selection operations. 下面介绍 在调用 以执行复杂选择操作时要指定哪些值。The following describes which values to specify when calling to perform complex selection operations. |OperationOperation|标志组合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |模拟单击To simulate a click|`OR` **注意：** 如果从你自己的应用程序中调用，此组合不会选择所需的控件。 `OR` **Note:** This combination will not select the desired control if called from within your own application. 不过，如果从外部应用程序调用，它将具有所需的效果。It will have the desired effect, however, if called from an external application.| |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来选择目标项To select a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击取消选择目标项To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |模拟 SHIFT + 单击To simulate SHIFT + click| `OR` `OR` | |选择对象范围并将焦点放在最后一个对象上To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|在起始对象上指定以设置选择定位点。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然后 再次调用，并 `OR` 在最后一个对象上指定。Then call again and specify `OR` on the last object.| |取消选择所有对象To deselect all objects|对任何对象指定。Specify on any object. 此标志取消选择除了刚选择的对象之外的所有选择的对象。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然后 再次调用并 对同一对象指定。Then call again and specify on the same object.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个可访问感知的图表控件，并使用 和 类公开辅助性信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 由于图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制，因此它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码演示如何重写 方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `invokeAttr` 参数可以是构造函数、方法、属性或字段。The `invokeAttr` parameter may be a constructor, method, property, or field. 必须指定合适的调用属性。A suitable invocation attribute must be specified. 通过将空字符串 ("") 作为成员的名称传递来调用类的默认成员。Invoke the default member of a class by passing the empty string ("") as the name of the member. `modifiers`参数与参数的长度相同，后者 `args` 表示元数据中被调用成员的参数特性。The `modifiers` parameter has the same length as the `args` parameter, representing the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata. 参数可以具有以下属性： pdIn、pdOut、pdRetval、pdOptional 和 pdHasDefault。A parameter can have the following attributes: pdIn, pdOut, pdRetval, pdOptional, and pdHasDefault. 这些属性分别表示 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和默认参数。These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器应用程序在包含类似于系统提供的对象的自定义 UI 对象时，可以调用此函数。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 服务器应用程序 `CreateStdAccessibleObject` 根据需要调用并重写 方法和属性以匹配其自定义对象。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 此方法将服务器开发人员保存为完全实现所有 属性和方法的工作。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 此函数与类似 `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` ，不同之处在于 `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` 允许您将类名称指定为参数，而 `CreateStdAccessibleObject` 使用与关联的类名称 `hwnd` 。This function is similar to `CreateStdAccessibleProxy`, except that `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` enables you to specify the class name as a parameter, whereas `CreateStdAccessibleObject` uses the class name associated with the `hwnd`. 调用此版本的与 `UseStdAccessible` 调用 objid 的客户端的两个参数版本相同。Calling this version of the `UseStdAccessible` is the same as calling the two parameter version with an objid of CLIENT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用系统提供的用户界面元素的指定类型的方法和属性创建一个辅助性对象。Creates an accessible object with the methods and properties for the specified type of system-provided user interface element. 服务器应用程序在包含类似于系统提供的对象的自定义 UI 对象时，可以调用此函数。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 服务器应用程序 `CreateStdAccessibleObject` 根据需要调用并重写 方法和属性以匹配其自定义对象。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 此方法将服务器开发人员保存为完全实现所有 属性和方法的工作。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 有效值 `objid` 。Valid `objid` values. |对象Object|ValueValue|说明Description| |------------|-----------|-----------------| |ALERTALERT|0xFFFFFFF60xFFFFFFF6|引用与窗口或应用程序关联的消息。Refers to a message associated with a window or application.| |字CARET|0xFFFFFFF80xFFFFFFF8|引用窗口中 (插入符号) 的文本插入条。Refers to the text insertion bar (caret) in the window.| |客户端CLIENT|0xFFFFFFFC0xFFFFFFFC|引用窗口的工作区。Refers to the window's client area. 在大多数情况下，操作系统会控制框架元素，而客户端对象则包含应用程序控制的所有元素。In most cases, the operating system controls the frame elements, and the client object contains all elements that the application controls.| |CURSORCURSOR|0xFFFFFFF70xFFFFFFF7|指鼠标指针。Refers to the mouse pointer. 系统中只有一个鼠标指针，并且它不是窗口的子级。There is only one mouse pointer in the system and it is not a child of a window.| |HSCROLLHSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFA0xFFFFFFFA|引用窗口的水平滚动条。Refers to the window's horizontal scroll bar.| |MENUMENU|0xFFFFFFFD0xFFFFFFFD|引用窗口的菜单栏。Refers to the window's menu bar.| |SIZEGRIPSIZEGRIP|0xFFFFFFF90xFFFFFFF9|指窗口的大小手柄，它是位于窗口框架右下角的一个可选框架组件。Refers to the window's size grip, an optional frame component located at the lower right corner of the window frame.| |段SOUND|0xFFFFFFF50xFFFFFFF5|引用 sound 对象。Refers to a sound object. Sound 对象没有屏幕位置或子对象，但具有名称和状态属性。Sound objects do not have screen locations or children, but do have name and state attributes. 它们是播放声音的应用程序的子项。They are children of the application playing the sound.| |SYSMENUSYSMENU|0xFFFFFFFF0xFFFFFFFF|引用窗口的系统菜单。Refers to the window's system menu.| |标题栏TITLEBAR|0xFFFFFFFE0xFFFFFFFE|引用窗口的标题栏。Refers to the window's title bar.| |VSCROLLVSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFB0xFFFFFFFB|引用窗口的垂直滚动条。Refers to the window's vertical scroll bar.| |WINDOWWINDOW|0x000000000x00000000|指的是窗口本身而不是子对象。Refers to the window itself rather than to a child object.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 属性表示对象包含的视觉信息。Typically, the property represents visual information contained by the object. 并非所有对象都支持 属性。Not all objects support the property. 在大多数情况下， 属性用于告诉客户端对象所包含的视觉对象信息。In most cases, the property is used to tell the client about what visual information an object contains. 例如，编辑控件的值是它包含的文本，但菜单项没有值。For example, the value for an edit control is the text it contains, but a menu item has no value. 属性可在诸如树视图控件等情况下提供分层信息。The property can provide hierarchical information in cases such as a tree view control. 尽管树视图控件中的父对象不提供属性中的信息 ，但控件中的每一项都有一个从零开始的值，它表示其在层次结构中的级别。Although the parent object in the tree view control does not provide information in the property, each item within the control has a zero-based value that represents its level within the hierarchy. 顶级项的值为零，第二级项的值为1，依此类推。Top-level items have a value of zero, second-level items have a value of one, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 从滚动条和跟踪条可访问对象返回的值指示百分比，因此它们是0到100（含）之间的整数。The values returned from scroll bar and trackbar accessible objects indicate percentages, so they are integers between 0 and 100, inclusive.

exception.span: 无法设置或检索值。

span.span: The value cannot be set or retrieved.
